Package org.validator.utils

All POJO's invoked by high level objects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileUtils
    Set of methods to handle IO file operations.
    Folder
    This is a lightweight implementation of a directory in the filesystem.
    SaxHandler
    This handler processes all events for a selected tag and retrieves the value of a selected attribute.
    SimpleFile
    Lightweight file implementation.
    TagSelector
    Utility class to quickly traverse a (metadata) file and return a list of values.
    XMLUtils
    XML Utilities

Package org.validator.utils Description

All POJO's invoked by high level objects. This is a collection of utility classes used across the application to handle files, formats and persistence.
Author:
danielgalassi@gmail.com
